cohortName: Neoplasm of thyroid gland referent incident cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4131909) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Neoplasm of thyroid gland referent prevalent cohort
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (4131909) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.
